title: Jumpseller API
description: Explore all our endpoints with your own set of of access tokens. All changes affect your production Jumpseller store.

post_categories_json.title: Create a new Category.
post_categories_json.description: Category's permalink is automatically generated from the given category's name.

get_countries__country_code__regions_jso.title: Retrieve all Regions from a single Country.

get_countries__country_code__regions__re.title: Retrieve a single Region information object.

delete_customer_categories__id__customer.title: Delete Customers from an existing CustomerCategory.

get_customer_categories__id__customers_j.title: Retrieves the customers in a CustomerCategory.

get_customers__id__fields.title: Retrieves the Customer Additional Field of a Customer.

post_customers__id__fields.title: Adds Customer Additional Fields to a Customer.

get_customers__id__fields__field_id_.title: Create a new Customer Additional Field.

post_orders_json.title: Create a new Order.
post_orders_json.description:
Use the JSON format:
'{ "order": {"status": "Paid", "shipping_method_id": 123, "products": [{ "id": 123, "qty": 1}], "customer": {"id": 123}}}'
or in CURL:
curl -X POST -d '{ "order": {"status": "Paid", "shipping_method_id": 123, "products": [{ "id": 123, "qty": 1}], "customer": {"id": 123}}}' "https://api.jumpseller.com/v1/orders.json?login=storecode&authtoken=XXXXX" -H "Content-Type:application/json"

get_orders_after__id__json.title: Retrieve orders filtered by Order Id.
get_orders_after__id__json.description: For example the GET /orders/after/5000 will return Order 5001, 5002, 5003, etc.

put_orders__id__json.title: Modify an existing Order.
put_orders__id__json.description:
Only 'status', 'tracking_number', 'tracking_company', 'additional_information' and 'additional_fields' are available for update.
Use the JSON format:
'{ "order": {"status": "Paid", "tracking_company": "other", "tracking_number": "123456789", "additional_information": "My custom message.", "additional_fields": [{"label": "Gift Name", "value": "Duarte"}, {"label": "Gift Wrapping Color", "value": "Green"}]} }}'
or in CURL:
curl -X PUT -d '{ "order": {"status": "Paid", "additional_information": "My custom message."}}' "https://api.jumpseller.com/v1/orders/{id}.json?login=storecode&authtoken=XXXXX" -H "Content-Type:application/json"

post_orders__id__history_json.title: Create a new Order History Entry.

get_products_after__id__json.title: Retrieves Products after the given id.

get_products_search_json.title: Retrieve a Product List from a query.

get_products_sku__sku__json.title: Retrieve a single Product by SKU.

post_products__id__fields_json.title: Create a new Product Custom Field.

post_products__id__options__option_id__v.title: Create a new Product Option Value.

get_products__id__options__option_id__va.title: Create a new Product Option Value.

put_products__id__options__option_id__va.title: Modify an existing Product Option Value.
